vote.title: Authorize a five-year service price agreement for the maintenance of gymnasium floors for the Park & Recreation Department - Ponder Company, Inc. in the estimated amount of $481,800 and Aegis USA Company in the estimated amount of $139,500, lowest responsible bidders of two - Total estimated amount of $621,300 - Financing:  General Fund
